rules.description: SpaceControl: Space enables Control mode name as spacefn_mode SpaceFN
SpaceFN: Backquote (`) to Escape, Space+[1-9] to F[1-9], Space+0 to F10, Space+Hyphen (-) to F11, Space+Equal Sign (=) to F12, Space+Comma to Tilde (~), Space+Slash (/) to Menu
Exchange hyper + arrow keys with option + arrow keys
